description: This file defines an interface for a key-value storage system with notification capabilities within the WPEFramework project. It contains the IStore interface and a nested INotification interface, both using virtual inheritance, with functions for registering notifications, setting, getting, and deleting values and namespaces.

classes.name: IStore
classes.description: An interface for a key-value store with notification support, allowing registration, value manipulation, and namespace management.

classes.name: IStore::INotification
classes.description: An interface for receiving notifications about storage changes, including value changes and storage limits.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification callback to receive store events.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered notification callback.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description: Sets a string value in the specified namespace and key.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.description: Retrieves a string value from the specified namespace and key, returning a status code.

methods.name: DeleteKey
methods.description: Deletes a key within a namespace.

methods.name: DeleteNamespace
methods.description: Deletes an entire namespace from the store.

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
